Text: What's the difference between this and the original Full Metal Alchemist??

The storyline in the beginning is fairly similar, but abbreviated. After a certain point however (around episode 12-13) it becomes a whole new story line. Only thing thats the same is their looking to restore their bodies using the philosophers stone. Aside from that? Don't expect anything to be the same =D

@Kypster
It's not really a "whole new story line".

Season 1 of Full Metal Alchemist came out before the Manga was finished. They didn't know where to go and made up a lot that had to do with the story.

Season 2 (Brotherhood) is following the Manga storyline, as the Manga is closing in on it's end.

Thanks for the episodes!
